Commands

_createHandles detached editor.

_runOpen files in detached editors.

CloseCloses detached editor.

DisplayTextDisplays file's text.

FindFinds string in text.

ModifiedCallback for modifying text.

OptionsGets options of new detached editor.

SaveFileSaves changed text.

ToolApplies tool to text.

alited::edit

Commands

BackupDirFileNamesGets directory and file names for backuping.

BackupFileMakes a backup copy of a file after the first modification of it.

BackupFileNameGets a backup name for a file (checking for backup's maximum).

BindPluginablesBinds pluginable formatters to the edited text.

CheckSaveIconsChecks for states of save buttons at modifications of files.

CheckUndoRedoIconsChecks for states of undo/redo button for a file being modified.

CommentComments selected lines of text.

CommentCharReturns the commenting chars for a current file.

CompareByLengthCompares two string by length.

ControlLeftGoes to a previous word's start/end as seen from programmer's viewpoint.

ControlRightGoes to a next word's start as seen from programmer's viewpoint.

DispatchMacroDispatches macro actions.

DoMacroPlays or records a macro.

EscapeValueEscapes a value's backslashes and braces.

FindColorValuesFinds color values.

FormatterNameGets formatter's file name from its full name.

FormatUnitDesc

HelpOnMacroShows Play Macro help.

HideColorValuesUnhighlights color values.

IndentIndent selected lines of text.

IniParameterGets parameter value from a line of ini-file.

InputMacroEnters/changes a macro.

InvertStringCaseInverts cases in a string (e.g. InversE -> iNVERSe).

MacroDirGets a directory name of macros.

MacroExistsChecks for existing macro. If the macro doesn't exist, shows a message and updates the macros list menu.

MacroFileNameGets a file name for a macro.

MacroInitInitializes macro stuff.

MacroMenuRecreate macros' menu.

MacroSourceLoads playtkl package.

MacroUpdateIf a file is a macro, updates macros' list.

makeRectSelects a rectangle.

ModifiedHandles a modification of file, recreating the unit tree at need.

NormIndentNormalizes a current text's indenting.

OpenFormatFileOpens file(s) from data/format directory or its subdirectories.

OpenMacroFileOpens a file of macro.

pasteRectPastes a rectangle.

PluginAcceleratorAdds -accelerator to Formats menu item or returns a list of accelerators used by pluginables.

ReadMacroCommentReads macro's comment.

RectSelectionStarts, ends, does, cuts, copies and pastes a rectangular selection. mode: 0 for start/end, 1 do, 2 cut, 3 copy, 4 paste

RemoveTrailWhitesRemoves trailing spaces of lines - all of lines or a selection of lines.

ReverseStringThe same as "string reverse", but counts escaping braces made in format::Mode2.

RunFormatDoes format according to a format file.

saveRectCuts & copies a rectangle.

SelectedLinesGets a range of lines of text that are selected at least partly.

SelectLinesSelects lines (all their contents) of text.

ShowColorValuesHighlights color values.

SourceFormatTclSources format.tcl.

SqueezeLinesSqueezes a list of lines.

SqueezeStringSqueezes multiple spaces to one space (except for leading spaces) and removes tailing spaces, e.g. " a b c " => " a b c".

UnCommentUncomments selected lines of text.

UnEscapeValueUnescapes a value's backslashes and braces.

UnIndentUnindent selected lines of text.

ValidMacroValidates the macro name.

ValidMacroRealGets "root tail" of the file name and saves its directory name. Changes the record icon depending on the macro file exists or not.

WatchMacroWatch the end of recording.

alited::favor

Commands

_initInitializes and shows favorite / last visited units' view.

AddAdds a unit to favorites.

AddFromTreeAdds a list of selected items of the tree to Favorites.

CopyDeclarationCopies a current unit's declaration to the clipboard.

CurrentIDGets ID of a currently selected favorite.

CurrentNameGets data of a current favorite.

DeleteDeletes an item from favorites.

DeleteAllDeletes all items from favorites.

DeleteLastVisitedDeletes last visited item.

GeoForQueryGets geometry for a query.

GetTooltipGets a tip of favorite / last visited unit's declaration.

GoToUnitEnters a unit.

InitFavoritesInitializes favorites list for possible "Back" of "Favorites' Lists".

IsFavoritesFilesChecks if the selected favorites list is a list of file names

IsSelectedGets data of currently selected item of favorites.

LastVisitedPuts an item to "Last visited" list.

ListsRuns "Lists of Favorites" dialogue, sets a list of favorites at a choice.

OpenFilesOpens files with current favorites.

OpenSelectedFileOpens a file from a selected item of favorites/last visited.

PopupMenuPrepares and runs a popup menu at clicking Favorites / last visited list.

RenameRenames a current favorite.

SelectHandles selecting an item of "Favorites / Last visited" treeview.

SetAndCloseSets favorites list, opens files from favorites list, closes other files.

SetFavoritesSets favorites/last visited list in the treeview.

ShowShows a list of favorites / last visited units.

ShowFavVisitShow favorites/last visits, depending on the mode.

ShowPopupMenuDisplays a popup menu at clicking Favorites / last visited list.

SkipVisitedSets/gets a flag to skip remembering a last visit.

SwitchFavVisitSwitches favorites / last visited units' view.

alited::favor_ls

Commands

_createCreates "Favorites lists" dialogue.

_runRuns "Favorites lists" dialogue.

AddHandles hitting "Add favorites' list" button.

AddFilesAdds .tcl files of current session as the favorites.

CancelHandles hitting Cancel button.

ChangeHandles hitting "Change favorites' list" button.

ComposeTextComposes a current text of favorites or files of favorites.

DeleteHandles hitting "Delete favorites' list" button.

DisplayFavorTextDisplays text of favorites or their files.

DisplayTextDisplays text of favorites or their files.

DoubleClickHandles double clicking on the list: in "Favorites" mode, invokes "Select" button, otherwise "Open...".

FocusFocuses on an item of the list.

GetIniReads favorites' lists data, stored in the ini file.

HelpHandles hitting Help button.

HelpMe'Help' for start.

IniFileReturns the ini file's name to store favorites' lists.

MessageDisplays a message in statusbar of favorites dialogue.

OkHandles hitting OK button.

ProcMessageHandles clicking on message label.

PutIniMakes favorites' lists data to store to the ini file.

Restore_favlistRestores favorites' list.

Save_favlistSaves favorites' list.

SelectHandles a selection in the list of favorites' lists.

SelectedGets a selected item of favorites list.

SplitSplits a saved list by the list's dividers.

TextGets the text widget's content.

alited::file

Commands

AddCreates a file at the file tree.

AddRecent

AllSavedChecks whether all files are saved. Saves them if not.

CheckForNewChecks if there is a file in bar of tabs and creates "No name" tab, if no tab exists.

ChooseMultipleFilesChoose miltiple files to open.

ChooseRecent

ClearupAlTagClears al array of tag,tab data.

ClearupOnCloseClearance after closing a file.

CloneFileClones a current file in a file tree.

CloneFileNameGets a clone's name.

CloseAllCloses files.

CloseAndDeleteCloses and deletes a file.

CloseFileCloses a file.

CloseFileMenuCloses the current file from the menu.

CommandForFile2Execute a command for two files.

DeleteDeletes file(s) at the file tree.

DeleteFileDeletes a file.

DeleteOneDeletes a file at the file tree.

DetachOpen file in detached editors

DetachedInfoGets detached editor's object and window.

DetachFromTree

DisplayFileDisplays a file's contents.

DoMoveFileAsks and moves a file to a directory.

DoRenameFileInTreePerforms renaming a current file in a file tree.

DropFilesMoves a group of selected files to other tree position.

EncodingGets/sets a file's encoding.

EOLGets/sets a file's translation.

FileAttrsReturns a file attributes: name & time.

FileSizeFormats a file's size.

FileStatGets a file's attributes: times & size.

FillRecentCreates "Recent Files" menu items.

InputFileNameDialogue to input a file name.

InsertRecent

IsClangChecks if a file is of C/C++.

IsModifiedChecks if a text of tab is modified.

IsNoNameChecks if a file name is "No name".

IsSavedChecks if a file is modified and if yes, offers to save it.

IsTclChecks if a file is of Tcl.

IsUnitFileChecks if a file has a unit tree.

MakeThemHighlightedSets flag "highlight file(s) anyway".

MoveExternalMoves an external file to a project's directory.

MoveFilesMoves file(s).

NewFileHandles "New file" menu item.

OpenDetachChoose files and open them in detached editors.

OpenFileHandles "Open file" menu item.

OpenFilesOpens files selected in the file tree.

OpenOfDirOpens all Tcl files of a directory.

OpenWithOpens files selected in the file tree, with their apps.

OutwardChangeChecks for change of file by an external application.

ReadFileReads a file, creates its unit tree.

ReadFileByTIDReads a file of tab, if needed.

RecreateFileTreeCreates the file tree.

Reload1Reloads a current file with EOL.

Reload2Reloads a current file with an encoding.

RemoveFileRemoves or backups a file, trying to save it in a directory.

RenameFileRenames a file.

RenameFileInTreeRenames a current file in a file tree.

SaveAllSaves all files.

SaveAndCloseSaves and closes a file.

SaveFileSaves the current file.

SaveFileAsSaves the current file "as".

SaveFileByNameSaves a file.

SaveTextSaves text buffer to file.

SbhTextShows/hides the horizontal scrollbar of the text.

SearchInFileTreeSearches a file name in file tree.

SelectFileInTreeFinds a file in file tree and selects it.

SelectInTreeSelects an item in the file tree.

SortTreeSelFilesSorts a list of file tree's selected files.

SourceDetachSources detached.tcl.

ToBeHighlightedChecks flag "highlight text anyway".

TreeFilenameFetches a file name selected in the file tree.

TreeSelFilesGets a list of file tree's selected files.

UpdateFileStatUpdates tips in tab bar (file info).

WrapLinesSwitches wrap word mode for a current text.

alited::find

Commands

_createCreates Find/Replace dialogue.

_runRuns Find/Replace dialogue.

btTPasteCopies text from "Find" to "Replace" field.

btTRetryResizes Find/Replace dialogue.

CheckDataChecks if the find/replace data are valid.

CheckWordCheck if the found string is a word, at searching by words,

ClearTagsClears find tags in all texts, if Find dialogues are closed.

CloseFindCloses Find/Replace dialogue.

CloseFind2Closes Find by List dialogue.

DoFindUnitRuns searching units in current text / all texts.

FillRE2TexFills a text field of RE2 dialog.

FindSearches one string in a current text.

FindAllSearches all strings in a text.

FindInSessionSearches all strings in a session.

FindInTextSearches all strings in a current text.

FindNextPerforms "find next" (F3 key) for the current text.

FindOptionsGets options of search, according to the dialogue's fields.

FindReplStrPrepares a string to find/replace for messages.

FindUnitDisplays "Find unit" frame.

FocusCbxForces focusing on "Find" field.

FocusCbx1Set focus on "Find" field.

GetCommandOfLineGets a command from a line.

GetCommandOfTextGets a command under the cursor.

GetFindEntryPuts a current selection of text to the "Find:" field

GetWordOfLineGets a word from a line.

GetWordOfTextGets a word of text under the cursor.

HelpFindHelps on search by list.

HideFindUnitHides "Find unit" frame.

InitShowResultsClears the info list before any search.

LastInvokeInvokes last Find button that was pressed. If Ctrl-F is pressed inside Find/Replace dialogue, the last pressed Find button will be invoked.

LookDeclPrepares and runs searching a declaration in a text.

LookDecl1Searches a declaration in a text.

NextGenerate F3 key pressing event.

NextFoundByListFinds next occurence of found strings.

NotFoundMessageShows "not found" message.

OKRE2Saves data, closes RE2 dialogue.

PrepareSearchByListPrepares searched word by list and search options.

PutInfoPuts a message to the info listbox widget, about a line found in a file.

RE2RE2 dialogue.

ReplaceReplaces one string and finds next.

Replace1Replaces a string found, possibly using regsub.

ReplaceAllReplaces all found strings in a text.

ReplaceInSessionHandles hitting "Replace in Session" button.

ReplaceInTextHandles hitting "Replace in Text" button.

SearchSearches a text for a string to find.

Search1Searches a text from a position for a string to find.

SearchByListSearches words by list.

SearchByList_DoDoes searching words by list.

SearchWordInSession

SessionButtonsPrepares buttons' label ("in all/selected tabs").

SetCursorSets the cursor in a text after a replacement made.

SetTagsAdds a tag of found strings to a text widget.

ShowResultsShows a message containing results of a search.

ShowResults1Shows a message of all found strings.

ShowResults2Shows a message of number of found strings (e.g. in a tab).

skipRE2Checks if a RE2 line has to be skipped.

stopRE2Checks if a text line stops RE2 list.

styleButtonRE2Gets RE2 button styled.

TabsToSearchGets a list of tabs to search something, beginning from a current tab.

UnsetTagsClears the text of the find tag.

alited::format

Commands

AfterFormattingActions after formatting: replace & update all & select the formatted stuff.

BeforeFormattingGets option for formatting - text's path, selected text and positions to process.

CancelHandles pressing Cancel button of Move Descriptions dialogue.

ChangeToAt changing the direction, fills 2 texts with "from/to" examples.

CheckOkCheck options of Move Descriptions dialogue.

CreateFormatIconCreate icon of formatter in toolbar.

EventOKChecks if an event is correct (not overlap alited key mapping).

HelpHandles "Help" button.

LeafREGets the chosen leaf's RE (current or standard, seen by the user).

Mode1Maps selection by pairs taken from config.file.

Mode2Applies a command to selection/current line.

Mode3Applies command(s) to lines of selection.

Mode4Applies external command(s) to selection or lines of selection.

Mode5Inserts a string at the current cursor position. Or does something without changing the text (if commands return "").

Mode6Runs a pluginable formatter.

MoveInsideMove a unit description outside the unit.

MoveOutMove a unit description outside the unit.

MoveUnitDescDoes move the unit descriptions.

OkHandles pressing OK button of Move Descriptions dialogue.

Re_ColorsGets colors for leaf's regexp (comment's fg & bg).

Re_FgColorSets foreground color for leaf's regexp.

Separ1Gets "real" separator and limit of its length (extracted from it).

ShowUnitDescDisplays unit descriptions to move.

StandardOptionsSets standard options of Move Descr.

UnitDescMoves unit description from inner to above units.

ValidateUnitDescValidates the separator's entry

ToolByKeyRuns a command after its hot key pressing in f5 tab of Projects.

ToolPrjDirnameGets dir name of current file.

ToolPrjEMCalls e_menu from toolbar.

alited::main

Commands

_createCreates a main form of the alited.

_runRuns the alited, displaying its main form with attributes 'modal', 'not closed by Esc', 'decorated with Contract/Expand buttons', 'minimal sizes' and 'saved geometry'. After closing the alited, saves its settings (geometry etc.).

AfterCutActions after cutting text: resets the unit tree's selection.

AfterUndoRedoActions after undo/redo.

BindsForCodeSets bindings for a code.

BindsForTextSets bindings for a text.

CalcIndentationCheck for "Auto detection of indentation" and calculates it at need.

CalcPadCalculates the indenting pad for the edited text.

ClearCbxClears a combobox's value and removes it from the combobox' list.

CurrentWTXTGets a current text widget's path.

CursorPosDisplays a current text's row and column in the status bar.

FillMarkBarFills the mark bar, makes bindings for its tags.

FocusInTextProcesses event on the text.

FocusTextSets a focus on a current text.

GetTextCreates or gets a text widget for a tab.

GetWTXTGets a text widget's path of a tab.

GotoBracketProcesses Alt+B keypressing: "go to a matched bracket".

GotoLineProcesses Ctrl+G keypressing: "go to a line".

GutterAttrsReturns list of gutter's data (canvas widget, width, shift)

HighlightLineHighlights a current line of a current text.

HighlightTextHighlights a file's syntax constructs.

InitActionsInitializes working with a main form of alited.

InsertLinePuts a new line into a text, attentive to a previous line's indentation.

MarkOptionsReturns options for marks.

MarkWidthChange the mark bar's width.

MarkWidthSaveSaves alited.ini at need.

PackTextWidgetsPacks a text and its scrollbar.

ProcMessageHandles clicking on message label.

RestoreMarksRestores mark data for a text to be shown.

SaveMarksSaves mark data for a text to be closed.

SaveVisitInfoRemembers data about current unit.

SetMarkSets a mark in the mark bar.

SetTabsConfigures tabs of a text.

ShowHeaderDisplays a file's name and modification flag (*) in alited's title.

ShowOutdatedTODOShows a balloon with outdated TODO.

ShowTextDisplays a current text.

TipStatusGets a tip for a status bar's short info.

UnsetAllMarksUnsets all marks in the mark bar.

UnsetMarkUnsets a mark in the mark bar or call a popup menu.

UnsetOneMarkUnsets one mark in the mark bar.

UpdateAllUpdates tree, text and gutter.

UpdateGutterRedraws the gutter.

UpdateIconsUpdates after replacements: icons.

UpdateMarkBarUpdates mark bar at changing -bg color.

UpdateProjectInfoDisplays a project settings in the status bar.

UpdateTextRedraws a text.

UpdateTextGutterRedraws both a text and a gutter.

UpdateTextGutterTreeUpdates after replacements: text, gutter, unit tree.

UpdateTextGutterTreeIconsUpdates after replacements: text, gutter, unit tree, icons.

UpdateUnitTreeRedraws unit tree at need.

Ok

alited::project

Commands

_createCreates and opens Projects dialogue.

_runRuns Projects dialogue.

Add"Add project" button's handler.

afterOpenCloseFilesActions after opening/closing files.

Cancel'Cancel' button handler.

Change"Change project" button's handler.

CheckNewDirChecks if the root directory exists. If no, tries to create it.

CheckOutdatedChecks for outdated TODOs of all projects except for the current. Return {} or a name of project with outdated TODOs.

CheckPrjLeafChecks "Regexp of a leaf" field.

CheckPrjUseLeafEnables/disables the "Regexp of a leaf" field.

CheckProjectNameRemoves spec.characters from a project name (sort of normalizing it).

ChecksComSets checks of "Commands / Run for all".

ChecksRunSets checks of "Commands / Run for project".

ClockFormatFormats date in seconds.

ClockScanScans date to get date in seconds.

ClockYMDExtracts year, month, day from date.

CloseSelFilesCloses selected files of listbox. Files are closed in a currently open project.

CurrentFileGets a current file of file listbox.

CurrProjectGets a current project name, from a current item of project list.

Delete"Delete project" button's handler.

DeleteFromTplListDeletes a template name from the list of project templates.

DetachSelFilesDetaches selected files.

ExistingProjectChecks if a project (of entry field) exists.

FocusInTabFocuses on a widget in a tab.

focusTreeSets focus on the treeview.

GetOptValGets a name and a value from a line of form "name=value".

GetProjectOptsReads a project's settings from a project settings file.

GetProjectsReads settings of all projects.

Help'Help' button handler.

HelpMe'Help' for start.

IsOutdatedChecks for outdated TODOs of a project.

KeyOnTreeHandles key press on the tree.

Klnd_buttonFire an event handler (paste/undo/redo) on a reminder.

Klnd_deleteClears a reminder.

Klnd_moveTODOMoves current TODO to a new date.

Klnd_nextMoves a reminder to days.

Klnd_next2Moves a reminder to 7 days.

Klnd_pastePastes a text to a reminder.

Klnd_previousMoves a reminder back to 1 day.

Klnd_previous2Moves a reminder back to 7 days.

Klnd_redoRedoes changes of a reminder.

Klnd_saveSaves a reminder on a date.

Klnd_undoUndoes changes of a reminder.

KlndBorderTextHighlights/unhighlights a reminder's border.

KlndClickProcesses a click on a calendar day.

KlndDateFormats a calendar date by alited's format (Preferences/Templates).

KlndDaySelects a date of reminder.

KlndDayRemSelects a date of reminder before a current one.

KlndInDateGets a date in seconds.

KlndOutDateGets a date formatted.

KlndPopupHandles a popup menu for the calendar.

KlndSearchSearch a date in calendar data.

KlndTextGets a reminder text for a date.

KlndTextModifiedProcesses modifications of calendar text.

KlndUpdateUpdates calendar data.

LbxPopupRuns a popup menu on the project files listbox.

MainFrameCreates a main frame of "Project" dialogue.

MessageDisplays a message in statusbar of projects dialogue.

NotesFileGets a file name of notes.

Ok'OK' button handler.

OnProjectEnterActions on entering a project.

OpenFileOpens a file of listbox after double clicking.

OpenSelFilesOpens selected files of listbox.

PopupMenuOpens a popup menu in the project list.

postValidateFilterPostvalidates the file filter change.

preValidateFilterPrevalidates the file filter change.

ProcMessageHandles clicking on message label. Shows the message and if it is about TODO, selects the corresponding project.

ProjectEnterProcesses double-clicking and pressing Enter on the project list. Cancels selecting projects if there are old reminders.

ProjectFileNameGets a project file name from a project's name.

ProjectNameGets a project name from its file name.

PutProjectOptsWrites a project's settings to a project settings file.

ReadNotesReads notes of a project and commands for Commands tab.

ReadRemsReads a file of reminders.

RemoveFromTplListRemoves a template name from the lists of template data.

RemsFileGets a file name of reminders.

RestoreSettingsRestores project settings from curinfo array.

RunComsHandles running commands of Commands tab.

SaveDataSaves some data.

SaveNotesFor a current item of project list, saves a file of notes and Commands tab's commands.

SaveSettingsSaves project settings to curinfo array.

SelectHandles a selection in a list of projects.

SelectAllFilesSelects all files of listbox.

SelectedGets a currently selected project's index.

SelectedPrjGets a project name of selected item.

SelFilesChecks for a selection of file listbox. Returns: list of listbox's path and the selection or {}.

SortRemsSorts reminders by date.

StdLeafRESets standard RE for leaf unit.

Tab1Creates a main tab of "Project".

Tab2Creates Options tab of "Project".

Tab3Creates Templates tab of "Project".

Tab4Creates Commands tab of "Project".

Tab5Creates Files tab of "Project".

TabFileFillFills a listbox of files.

TabFileFilterFills a listbox with a list of filtered files of all projects.

TabFileHeadingShow Files tab's heading.

TabFileInfoFills a listbox with a list of project files.

TemplateCreates a project by template as set in Template tab. The template can contain directories or files (indented for subdirectories). The files satisfy glob-patterns: changelog, license, licence, readme.

TipOnFileShows info on a file in the file list as a tooltip.

TplDefaultSets default contents of project template.

TplDefaultTextGets default contents of project template.

UpdateMsgDisplays a message on project updating.

UpdateTplListsUpdates lists of template data, setting the current template on the top.

UpdateTplTextUpdates the template text.

UpdateTreeFills a list of projects.

ValidateDirTries to get a project name at choosing root dir.

ValidateIniValidates values of alited.ini.

ValidProjectChecks if a project's options are valid.

ViewDirShows file chooser just to view the project's dir

alited::run

Commands

_run

CancelHandles hitting "Cancel" button.

ChbForcedChecks states & values of widgets.

DeleteForcedRunClears current combobox' value.

FillTex1Fills command content text.

FillTex2Fills "commands before running" text.

HelpShows Run's help.

InitTex12Initializes texts & combobox (colors, events, highlighting etc.).

RunRuns a command of "Run..." dialogue.

RunOptionsSets options of "Run..." dialogue.

SaveSaves settings of "Run..." dialogue.

ValidatePathValidates a path chosen from the file picker.

alited::tool

Commands

_closeCloses e_menu (being an internal procedure) by force.

_runRuns e_menu's item of menu.em.

AddTooltipRunAddition to Run's tooltip.

AfterStartRuns commands after starting alited.

AfterStartDlgDialogue "Setup/For Start".

AfterStartSyntaxHighlight "Setup/For Start" text's syntax, at least Tcl part of it.

aloupePathGets aloupe ini file's path.

CheckTclCheck a current unit for errors, before running Tcl file.

ColorPickerCalls a color picker passing to it and getting from it a color.

ComForcedChecks whether a forced command is set.

DatePickerCalls a calendar to pick a date.

e_menuRuns e_menu.

e_menu1Runs e_menu.

e_menu2Runs e_menu.

e_menu3Prepares TF= argument for e_menu and runs e_menu's main menu.

EM_AllStructureGets all items of all menus.

EM_AllStructure1Gets recursively all items of all menus.

EM_commandGets e_menu command.

EM_dirReturns a directory of e_menu's menus.

EM_HotKeyReturns e_menu's hotkeys which numerate menu items.

EM_menuhereChecks if m=$mnu is present in e_menu's arguments.

EM_OptionsReturns e_menu's general options.

EM_optionTFPrepares TF= option for e_menu.

EM_SaveFilesSaves all files before running e_menu, if this mode is set in "Preferences".

EM_StructureGets a menu's items.

FormatDateFormats a date.

HelpCalls a help on alited.

InsertInTextInsert a string into a text possibly instead of its selection.

is_emenuCheck for e_menu's existence.

is_mainmenuChecks if e_menu's arguments are for the main menu (run by F4).

LineCoordinatesGets X, Y screen coordinates of current line.

LoupeCalls a screen loupe.

PopupBarOpens a popup menu in the tool bar, to enter e_menu's preferences.

PrepareRunCommandPrepares a command to run. The command can include wildcards.

RedoRedoes a change.

redoAllRedoes all changes.

Run_in_e_menuRuns a command with e_menu application

RunArgsGets ARGS/RUNF/EXEC arguments (similar to ::em::get_AR of e_menu.tcl).

RunFileRuns a current file as is (by associated app).

RunModeRuns Tcl source file with choosing the mode - in console or in tkcon.

RunsRuns a list of Tcl/ext commands.

RunTclTry to run tcl source file by means of tkcon utility.

SetPlainTextSet the flag "plain text".

SHargGets SH= argument of e_menu (main window's geometry).

SrcPathGets a path to an external tool. This may be useful at calling alited by tclkit: tkcon, aloupe etc. may be located in "src" subdirectory of alited.

tkconCalls Tkcon application.

tkconOptionsGets options of tkcon.tcl.

tkconPathGets the path to tkcon.tcl.

ToolButNameHelper procedure to get a name of toolbar button.

TooltipRunGets a tip for "Run" tool.

UndoUndoes a change.

undoAllUndoes all changes.

alited::tree

Commands

AddItemAdds a new item to the tree.

AddTagsCreates tags for the tree.

AddTagSelAdds tagSel tag to the unit tree's item.

AddToDirContentsAdds an item to a list of directory's contents.

AdjustWidthFixes a problem with the tree scrollbar's width at resizing the panes. The problem occurs if Frame's width is less than Tree's + Scrollbar's, as then the scrollbar is squeezed. Thus the Tree's width should be adjusted. The restart of alited will fully repair this.

ButtonMotionStarts moving an item of the tree.

ButtonPressHandles a mouse clicking the tree.

ButtonReleaseHandles a mouse button releasing on the tree, at moving an item.

ColorUnitsTreeColor units of the tree.

CreateCreates a tree of units/files, at need.

CreateFilesTreeCreates a file tree.

CreateUnitsTreeCreates a unit tree for a tab.

CurrentItemGets ID of selected item of the tree.

CurrentItemByLineGets item ID of unit tree for a current text position.

DeleteRemoves recursively an item and its children from the tree.

DelItemRemoves an item from the tree.

DestroyMoveWindowDestroys an item moving window.

DirContentsReads a directory's contents.

DropItemsDrops (moves) selected items to a current position.

ExpandContractTreeExpands or contracts the tree.

ExpandSelectionExpands the tree selection, counting the file tree expanded mode.

ForEachScans all items of the tree.

GetDirectoryContentsGets a directory's contents.

GetTooltipGets a tip for unit / file tree's item.

GetTreeGets a tree or its branch.

IgnoredDirChecks if a directory is in the list of the ignored ones.

MoveItemMoves items of the tree (units or files)

NewItemIDGets a new ID for the tree item.

NewSelectionSelects a new item of the unit tree.

OpenFileOpens file at clicking a file tree's item.

PrepareDirectoryContentsPrepares reading a directory's contents.

RecreateTreeRecreates the tree and restores its selections.

SaveCursorPosSaves current unit's cursor position.

SeeFileSees file name in file tree.

SeeSelectionSees (makes visible) a current selected item in the tree.

SelectUnitsSelects units at Ctrl/Shift clicking the unit tree.

ShowPopupMenuCreates and opens a popup menu at right clicking the tree.

SwitchTree

syOptionGets -geometry option of dialogues.

UnitTitleGets a title of a unit (checking for empty string).

UnitTooltipGets unit's tooltip.

UpdateFileTreeUpdates the file tree (colors of files).

alited::unit

Commands

AddRuns a dialog "Add Template" and adds a chosen template to a text.

CorrectPosCorrects an insert position, counting the insertion point's indentation.

DeleteDeletes a unit from a text.

DropUnitsMoves unit(s) from one location in the unit tree to other.

GetDeclarationGets a unit's declaration.

GetHeaderGets a header of unit: declaration + initial comments.

GetUnitsGets a unit structure from a text.

InsertTemplateInserts a template into a current text.

IsLeafRegexpChecks for using "leaf's regexp" setting.

LeafRegexpGets "leaf's regexp" setting.

MoveL1L2Moves a text lines to other location.

MoveUnitMoves a unit up/down the unit tree.

MoveUnitsMoves selected units up/down the unit tree.

RecreateUnitsRecreates the internal tree of units.

Run_unit_tplRuns Templates dialogue.

SearchByHeaderGets tree item ID of a units by its header (declaration+initial comment).

SearchInBranchChecks whether a unit is in a branch.

Source_unit_tplSources unit_tpl.tcl.

SwitchUnitsSwitches between last two active units.

TemplateDataReplaces the template wildcards with data of current text and unit.

TemplateMapMaps a string using template wildcards.

UnitHeaderModeGets modes for unit tree : do use RE for leaf headers and do not.

UnitRegexpGets RE to check unit's beginning.

alited::unit_tpl

Commands

_createCreates "Templates" dialogue.

_runRuns "Templates" dialogue.

AddHandles "Add template" button.

CancelHandles "Cancel" button.

ChangeHandles "Change template" button.

ClearCbxHelper to clear the combobox's selection.

DeleteHandles "Delete template" button.

FocusSets the focus on the template list's item.

GetKeyListCreates a key list for "Keys" combobox.

HelpHandles "Help" button.

HelpMe'Help' for start.

ImportHandles "Import templates" button.

InTextGoes into the template's text and sets the cursor on it.

MessageDisplays a message in statusbar of templates dialogue.

OkHandles "OK" button.

PosReturns a cursor position in the template's text.

ProcMessageHandles clicking on message label.

ReadIniGets templates' data from al(TPL,list) saved in alited.ini.

RegisterKeysRegisters key bindings of templates, to save them to alited.ini afterwards.

SaveIniPuts templates' data to al(TPL,list) to save in alited.ini.

SelectSelects an item of the template list.

SelectedGets ID or index of currently selected item of the template list.

SyntaxTextPrepares syntax highlighting of template's text

TextReturns the contents of the template's text.

UpdateTreeUpdates the template list.
